init.description: Configure how often Home Assistant connects to the Boks to update status.

options.cloud: Cloud Login (Automatic - requires valid credentials for the official Boks app)

add_parcel.name: Add Parcel
add_parcel.description: Adds a new parcel to the list

description.name: Description
description.description: Adds a description to the parcel

open_door.name: Open Door
open_door.description: Opens the Boks door, optionally with a PIN code.

code.name: PIN Code
code.description: The 6-character PIN code to use for opening (0-9, A, B).

add_master_code.name: Add Master Code
add_master_code.description: Adds a new master code to the Boks at a specific index. Overwrites any existing code at that index.

index.name: Index
index.description: The storage index for the master code (0-255).

delete_master_code.name: Delete Master Code
delete_master_code.description: Deletes a master code from the Boks using its index.

index.name: Index
index.description: The index of the master code to delete (0-255).

add_single_code.name: Add Single Use Code
add_single_code.description: Adds a new single use code to the Boks.

delete_single_code.name: Delete Single Use Code
delete_single_code.description: Deletes a single use code from the Boks using its value.

code.name: PIN Code
code.description: The 6-character PIN code (0-9, A, B) to delete.

add_multi_code.name: Add Multi Use Code
add_multi_code.description: Adds a new multi use code to the Boks.

delete_multi_code.name: Delete Multi Use Code
delete_multi_code.description: Deletes a multi use code from the Boks using its value.

code.name: PIN Code
code.description: The 6-character PIN code (0-9, A, B) to delete.

clean_master_codes.name: Clean Master Codes
clean_master_codes.description: Scans and deletes Master Codes in a specified index range to remove ghosts. Limit: 100 indices per run.

start_index.name: Start Index
start_index.description: The index to start cleaning from (0-255).

sync_logs.name: Sync Logs
sync_logs.description: Manually retrieve logs from the Boks and trigger associated events.

set_configuration.name: Set Configuration
set_configuration.description: Modify Boks configuration settings (NFC, hardware, etc.).

laposte.name: La Poste (Vigik)
laposte.description: Enable or disable La Poste tag recognition.

nfc_scan_start.name: Start NFC Scan
nfc_scan_start.description: Starts NFC tag scanning mode for 20 seconds.

nfc_register_tag.name: Register NFC Tag
nfc_register_tag.description: Registers an NFC tag in the whitelist. PREREQUISITE: You must first run 'Start NFC Scan' and scan the tag.

uid.name: Tag UID
uid.description: The Unique ID of the tag (e.g. A1B2C3D4).

name.name: Friendly Name
name.description: Optional name to save in HA Tag Registry.

nfc_unregister_tag.name: Unregister NFC Tag
nfc_unregister_tag.description: Removes an NFC tag from the Boks whitelist.

uid.name: Tag UID
uid.description: The Unique ID of the tag to remove.

ask_door_status.name: Check Door Status
ask_door_status.description: Manually poll the Boks to check if the door is open or closed.

generate_update_package.name: Generate Update Package
generate_update_package.description: Prepares a local webpage to update Boks firmware via Bluetooth.

delete_update_package.name: Delete Update Package
delete_update_package.description: Deletes the firmware file and update interface for a specific version.
